name: United Vision Marketing Firm
tag_list: uvmf, nonopearson, marketing, pearsonplc, sales, publicrelations, media, technology, intellectualproperty
overview:
The team at United Vision Marketing Firm continues to fight on the front line to help entrepreneurs realize their vision and even our own vision.

Starting in the living room on Valentines Day with very little start up capital from a life insurance policy, a much depleted 401k inheritance, and many doors being slammed in our faces, we are proud to say that we have over come many obstacles.

Our team players are experienced, insightful, resourceful and most of all we care about people, we are not out to exploit you to make a quick buck.

This year our work began to show up on the Forbes radar as a finalist in their 2011 search for Americas Most Promising Companies and a quote from our CEO Dr. Pearson in the Forbes Worlds Billionaires List about developing the youth on financial literacy via music and entertainment.

We fully understand the commitment and the relentless pursuit it takes to become and stay successful. Our commitment is to help you through the process and help you and your organization thrive as a perennial force.
